name: tm24
effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: DragonBreath)

flavor_text.sun_moon: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
